structure:CodeList.structure:Name: PPP CGS Country Measure Types (price, quantity)

structure:Code.structure:Description: Convenience stores, mini-markets, service station shops, neighbourhood shops, corner shops and kiosks
Public and semi public service providers
Regular prices corresponding to discounted prices

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Type of measure (e.g. price, quantity).
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Corresponds to the measure dimension for non-cross sectional SDMX formats

structure:Concept.structure:Name: ECP SPD
structure:Concept.structure:Description: SPD to which the item belongs

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Weight
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Percentage weight within the SPD (Sararies survey)/ BH weight (CPI survey)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Actual Employer Contribution
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Employers' actual social contributions (national account ratio)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Imputed Employer Contribution
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Employers' imputed social contributions (national account ratio)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Observation value
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Observation value. Primary measure for non-cross sectional SDMX formats

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Separator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Separator used in the SPECIFICATIONS attribute to distinguish the different name / value pairs

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Representativity of the item to be priced
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates whether the product/item priced is representative or not

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Make (and nationality)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Make (and nationality) of the priced item

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Comparability
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates whether the product/item priced and the product/item specified are identical (1) or equivalent (2)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Item Specifications
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Item specifications (List name / value pairs) for Equipment Goods items

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Order quantity
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Order quantity specified in terms and conditions of sale

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Unit price
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Unit price specified in terms and conditions of sale

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Options
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Used to store any other options/information at item level

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Total unit price without VAT
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total, net of VAT, of the amounts that purchasers actually pay for the item of equipment to be delivered, assembled and installed in working order at the production site where it will be used. The price should also be net of discounts. Represents the primary measure in Equipment Goods survey

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Flag
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates the status of a price (e.g. modified, original, etc)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Observation Number
structure:Concept.structure:Description: A sequential number for distinguishing the different prices reported for the same item, country and survey instance

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Shop Type
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Type of shop, from which the price was collected

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Shop identifier
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Specific shop, from which the price was collected

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Other characteristics / values
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Other characteristics (List of name / value pairs)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Other
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Used to store any other information at item level. The contents of this field are name-value pairs separated by the character indicated in "CHARS_SEPARATOR". For the moments it is used to store local comments at item level. This must be indicated in the content of this field like this. LOCALCOMMENTS=bla bla bla

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Locale use
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Used to store any other information at observation level for local use. The contents of this field are name-value pairs separated by the character indicated in "CHARS_SEPARATOR". For the moments it is used to store the price collector and a free text value for local user. Example of usage: LOCAL_USE="COLLECTOR=Maria|OTHER=other comments goes here".

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Finilised
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates the finalisation status of an item.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Seasonality of the item to be priced
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates if the item is seasonal or not

structure:Concept.structure:Name: The discount flag of an observation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The discount flag at observation level

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Average prices reported
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates whether average prices are reported or not

structure:KeyFamily.structure:Name: Purchasing Power Parities - Consumer Goods - Country Data
